tns:patch.author: Dolghier Constantin
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_ni_orgs_dimension CASCADE; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_ni_orgs_dimension AS SELECT org.amp_org_id, org.name AS org_name, org.org_code, grp.amp_org_grp_id AS amp_org_grp_id, grp.org_grp_name AS org_grp_name, tp.amp_org_type_id AS amp_org_type_id, tp.org_type AS org_type_name, tp.org_type_code, org.acronym AS org_acronym FROM amp_organisation org LEFT JOIN amp_org_group grp ON org.org_grp_id = grp.amp_org_grp_id LEFT JOIN amp_org_type tp ON grp.org_type = tp.amp_org_type_id
